title: How to Trace an IP Address

steps.title: Find the IP address that you want to trace.
steps.content: Find the IP address that you want to trace. You can find a website's IP address on Windows, Mac, iPhone, and Android platforms. You can also find a Skype user's IP address if necessary.

steps.title: Open the WolframAlpha website.
steps.content: Open the WolframAlpha website. Go to https://www.wolframalpha.com/ in your web browser.

steps.title: Click the search bar.
steps.content: Click the search bar. It's at the top of the page. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the IP address that you found.
steps.content: Enter the IP address that you found. For example, if you wanted to trace Facebook's IP address, you would type 157.240.18.35 into the search bar.

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter . Doing so will search for the IP address' geographical details.

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. WolframAlpha will typically show things like the type of IP address, the address' Internet Service Provider (e.g., Comcast), and the city in which the IP address is currently active. You can click More to the right of the "IP address registrant:" heading to view information about the registered city. If WolframAlpha doesn't display the IP address' information, try using IP Lookup instead.

steps.title: Find the IP address that you want to trace.
steps.content: Find the IP address that you want to trace. You can find a website's IP address on Windows , Mac , iPhone, and Android platforms. You can also find a Skype user's IP address if necessary.

steps.title: Open the IP Lookup website.
steps.content: Open the IP Lookup website. Go to https://community.spiceworks.com/tools/ip-lookup/ in your web browser.

steps.title: Click the search bar.
steps.content: Click the search bar. This is the white box below the "IP Address or Hostname" heading.

steps.title: Type in the IP address that you found.
steps.content: Type in the IP address that you found. For example, you'd type in 172.217.7.206 to search for one of Google's addresses.

steps.title: Click Lookup IP.
steps.content: Click Lookup IP . This blue button is to the right of the text field. Doing so will search for your entered IP address.

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. IP Lookup provides you with basic information about the IP address' location (e.g., city and state) along with a map and a location pin. To ensure your Windows desktop computer or laptop is safe from viruses, use the Windows Defender. It is an anti-virus software built into a Windows operating system. You can use this software instead of other paid and tested software because they may try to clean up programs and software on your computer that are not bad. Email providers like MSN, Gmail, or Yahoo have different filter systems. To know if the email is legit or not is to look at the domain of the email.
